#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
int cmpfunc (const void * a, const void * b)
{
   return ( *(int*)a - *(int*)b );
}
int main()
{ int tc;
  scanf("%d",&tc);
  while(tc--)
   { char str1[15];
     scanf("%s",str1);
     char str2[15];
     scanf("%s",str2);
     int arr1[15],arr2[15];
     int i,n=0;
     for(i=0;str1[i]!='\0';i++)
       { arr1[i]=str1[i]-'0';
         n++;
         arr2[i]=str2[i]-'0';
       }
     qsort(arr1, n, sizeof(int), cmpfunc);
     i=0;
     while((arr1[i]==0)&&(i<n))
       { i++;
       }
     if(i==n)
       { printf("AC\n");
         continue;
       }
     int temp=arr1[0];
     arr1[0]=arr1[i];
     arr1[i]=temp;
     for(i=0;i<n;i++)
      { if(arr1[i]==arr2[i])
          continue;
        else
          break;
      }
     if(i==n)
       printf("AC\n");
     else
       printf("WA\n");
    }
return 0;
}
